snippet: The Service Employees International Union and the American Federation of State, County and Municipal Employees are collaborating in ways some see as a path to a merger.
abstract: American Federation of State, County and Municipal Employees and Service Employees International Union are completing formal plan to collaborate that would increase their political campaigning, organizing and bargaining effectiveness; resolution, which will need to be ratified at conventions this year, starts process that could lead to merger between nation's two largest labor unions.

byline.original: By STEVEN GREENHOUSE and NOAM SCHEIBER

lead_paragraph: The Service Employees International Union and the American Federation of State, County and Municipal Employees are collaborating in ways some see as a path to a merger.

headline.main: 2 Big Labor Unions Share Efforts to Gain Power and Scale
headline.print_headline: 2 Unions Share Goals and Plan Partnerships
